entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: a group of people involved with the dark arts, mentioned as having powers and being feared by others.

entities.name: dark mark
entities.description: a mysterious object that can be conjured to show support or scare away death eaters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: a student at hogwarts who is trying to understand the dark mark and its purpose.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: a member of the order of the phoenix who provides information about the dark mark and death eaters.

relationships.description: only death eaters know how to conjure the dark mark, according to mr. weasley.
hermione is trying to understand the purpose of the dark mark and who might have conjured it.
mr. weasley has knowledge about death eaters and their abilities, including how to conjure the dark mark.
